top_comments.comment: Do the hermits just not like normal biomes so they decide to make their own. First cub now ren, plus ren made mustafar and tatooine last season lol

comments_since_last_sample.body: tbh i hadn't even noticed the octagon was on an island, definitely not the part of the view that catches the eye.
How you get resources... Ask doc

Put the barrel obtrusively in their way to check stock so that they can't avoid noticing it. Also, perhaps write Octagon on the crawler signs in the other blocks you sell as well and make the signs 4 sided to tempt anyone passing by with some of your wares. ;)
I love the metal rock music in the meeting clip
When I see the white concrete powder here my mind goes to salt instead of snow. Maybe I’m weird though!

That big block sign inside the Octagon won't work because it is just another green copper thing in a base that is already swamped with green copper accent. I recommend switch to something that stands out, preferably to the degree that other Hermits will comment on your horrible decorating taste. Bright magenta, perhaps? Maybe throw in some fugly terracotta, too.
Do the hermits just not like normal biomes so they decide to make their own. First cub now ren, plus ren made mustafar and tatooine last season lol

The payment system is confusing. Firstly, there is more than one barrel. Second, you have to look closely at the barrels to see what they are, because the item frames hide most of the barrel texture, making it difficult to spot that they are barrels.
Maybe make the item frames invisible so the barrel is more obvious.
Man, I was doubting the white concrete but it makes the octagon stand out so nice!
